sources.title: Speed
sources.description: Title: Speed Summary: Directed by: REMOVE_TAG Actors: Production Company: Tenneck Pictures Release Date: 1927 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: The Van Gort jewels have been missing for three years. Francis Fontyne has stolen them, but now the Secret Service is on his trail in the persons of special agent Jean Hillis, Detective Bryce, and Jean's wonder dog Lightnin'. Bryce is abducted by Fontyne's gang and Jean is misled by her maid, who actually works for the gang. Rookie agent Tom Haldane helps as Lightnin' and Jean track down the gang.
metadata.Actors: Eileen Sedgwick, Lightning the Dog, Wilbur McGaugh
